name: Creamy Tomato & Bacon Sauce
recipeIngredient: 8 rashers of smoked back bacon (finely chopped),
recipeInstructions: 1. Put the garlic, tomatoes, oil, oregano and sugar in a saucepan, bring to the boil, then reduce the heat,  cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
2. Add the bacon and simmer, uncovered for a further 5 minutes. Season to taste with salt and peper.
3. Stir in the marscapone, heat through, and adjust the seasoning if necessary.
